sectionTitle: THE PURPOSE OF THIS PLAN IS TO OUTLINE THE STEPS THAT EVERY EMPLOYER AND EMPLOYEE CAN TAKE TO REDUCE THE RISK OF EXPOSURE TO COVID-19. THE PLAN DESCRIBES HOW TO PREVENT WORKER EXPOSURE TO CORONAVIRUS, PROTECTIVE MEASURES TO BE TAKEN AT WORK, AND WORK PRACTICE CONTROLS TO BE USED, CLEANING AND DISINFECTING PROCEDURES, AND WHAT TO DO IF A WORKER BECOMES SICK.

projects.heading: Back To Work Best Practices
projects.desc: Guide to re-opening as businesses in the Indianapolis Metro begin re-opening and returning to work

projects.heading: Work Place Quick Facts
projects.desc: General set of FAQs and high level Covid-19 information for your office and employees

projects.desc: Guidance for what your workplace could use if there was an exposure incident

projects.heading: Response Plan Template
projects.desc: It is highly recommended to review this guide and customize as needed for your workplace prior to opening
